name: Gerry Themes
description:
Modify scheme and text background style from dark purple theme
Original theme:https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/12100-dark-purple-theme
Inspiration from:https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/13016-atom-one-dark-by-mayke
notes:
1.1: improve scheme performance
1.2: improve javascript keyword performance
1.3: suit for material theme ui plugin
1.4: fix foreground color, improve class performance
1.5: modify file status color and scheme
1.6: modify selection tree/list color
1.7: fix file status color with material theme ui
1.8: fix local history color with material theme ui
2.0: add oceanic theme and voilet theme
2.1: add space theme
2.2: reduce space theme selBg brightness and changed accent color
2.3: modify button color and separatorColor color;change caret row color.
2.4: fix violet and oceanic git log background color.
3.0: set until-build version to 211.
3.1: set file color to bg.
3.2: modify error color.
3.3: add gerry space+ scheme.
3.4: add popup menu border.
3.5: set until-build version to 221.Add Notification color scheme.
3.6: add contrast theme.
3.7: set until-build version to 222. Changed space scheme editor background more darker.
3.8: change gerry space caret row color darker.Adjust treeArea background color.
3.9: update document background color.
3.10: fix cs color.
3.11: fix popup header color.
